title: wormlike
extract: wormlike (comparative more wormlike, superlative most wormlike) Resembling or characteristic of a worm. The plastic fishing lure was remarkably wormlike. He has a wormlike view of the universe. (chemistry, of the molecules of a polymer) Having a smoothly curved form when heated.
extract_html: wormlike (comparative more wormlike, superlative most wormlike) Resembling or characteristic of a worm. The plastic fishing lure was remarkably wormlike. He has a wormlike view of the universe. (chemistry, of the molecules of a polymer) Having a smoothly curved form when heated.
